name: Heartomics: Lost Count
description: Battle humanoid "Heartomics" in this sexy shooter, Heartomics: Lost Count. A bullet hell game that uses fan service to entice players. Join us in the challenge to evade visually stunning shot patterns with thousands of bullets. Can you uncover the hidden mysteries!?

reviews.review_text: Ashamed to say what made it really really really good.
this game is one big mess.The Visual Novel reads the same repeat. oh he forgoten who he was. wakes up he forgot who he was. I have seen 99 cent games do better.
